credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Calvin W. Stillman
dimensions:
H x diam. (largest example): 5.1 x 1.7 cm (2 x 11/16 in.)
H x diam. (smallest example): 1.8 x 1.3 cm (11/16 x 1/2 in.)
title: Beads
description: Forty-six glass beads; all cylindrical with exception of one with tapered ends. The designs, usually on a solid-color core are mostly variations of millefiori patterns either in all-over decoration or in vertical, horizontal or spiral stripes.
name: Beads
